seo_keywords: Shark Rotator TruePet brush not spinning

problems.title: Handle Hose Tear / Hissing Sound
problems.description: Loud air noise near the handle and loss of suction.
possible_causes: Stress crack in the handle hose
solution_steps: Inspect the short hose connecting the handle to the wand.
This is a modular part. You replace the whole handle assembly.
Duct tape only works for a few days.

problems.title: Brush Roll Light is Red
problems.description: Floor nozzle lights are red and brush isn't turning.
solution_steps: Check the small hose at the bottom of the floor nozzle.
If it's split, you can buy a repair hose instead of a whole new head.
